question: 残余
sourceMnemonic:
The <kanji>remaining</kanji> <kanji>surplus</kanji> is the <vocabulary>remainder</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>residual</vocabulary> left over.

Just bear in mind that this is a technical word that you'll mostly see in legal and financial contexts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
